name: com.ringo.save-system
description: Package for a basic generic save system. Features asynchronous loading.

samples.displayName: Singleton Versions of Bindables, SaveLoader and Saveables
samples.description: Made for quick setup of save system. Personally, I would recommend not using this and instead using something like a ServiceLocator. But this can be used as a base.
Quick prototype I made of a SaveSubsystem that saves the current scene and loads it. Makes use of my SceneManager and does not import it automatically, will break things!
